item.title: Pre-Windows 2000 Computer
item.description: Enum pre2k Installation python3 -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate git clone https://github.com/garrettfoster13/pre2k.git cd pre2k/ pip3 install . Query # Unauth pre2k unauth -d '<DOMAIN>' -dc-ip '<DC_IP>' -verbose -inputfile '<MACHINES_FILE>' $ cat machines.txt banking$ $ pre2k unauth -d example.com -dc-ip 192.168.1.10 -verbose -inputfile 'machines.txt' ___ __ /'___`\ /\ \ _____ _ __ __ /\_\ /\ \\ \ \/'\ /\ '__`\/\`'__\/'__`\ _______\/_/// /__\ \ , < \ \ \L\ \ \ \//\ __//\______\ // /_\ \\ \ \\`\ \ \ ,__/\ \_\\ \____\/______/ /\______/ \ \_\ \_\ \ \ \/ \/_/ \/____/ \/_____/ \/_/\/_/ \ \_\ v3.
